referencedBy.comment: The measure of the duration of the automatic extension for this trade contract.
The measure of the age of this guest person.
The measure of the expected time interval between the receipt of an order and its delivery fulfilment according to this line trade agreement.
The measure of the expected time interval between the receipt of an order and its pick-up fulfilment according to this line trade agreement.
The measure of the maximum length of time for this specified period, such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The measure of the minimum length of time for this specified period, such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The measure of the life span of this trade product from date of delivery.
The measure of the life span of this trade product from date of opening.
The measure of the life span of this trade product from date of production.
